scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:components
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && git add packages/core/package.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git tag "v$(node -p 'require("./packages/core/package.json").version')" && git push origin main && git push --tags
